device.name: Light, Temperature and Occupancy Sensor
device.description: This device measure the light intensity and the temperature of the piece and detect the presence of a person in the room

attribute.name: valueTemperature
attribute.description: Represents the temperature in the room.

attribute.name: UnitTemperature
attribute.description: This attribute represents the temperature measuring unit. It is the abbreviation of the UnitName.

attribute.name: UnitIntensity
attribute.description: This attribute represents the light intensity measuring unit. It is the abreviation of the UnitName.

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).
